name: Pong For Android (NPCwaffle)
description:
Hello there,

This is a game called 'Pong', and I have made it myself using unity. This project is still in development, so do expect many issues and bugs; I am an amateur developer, but am looking to advance with this game. I would be extremely grateful for any support, and if you are kindly looking to help me strive, please do either donate via the options above, or watch as many ads as possible using the 'Ads' button in the game's main menu.

Thanks!

NPCwaffle
